title: The Vandal and the Virgin
description: Julia’s having a tough day. She’s learned that sacrificing virgins is still a thing in her homeland, and SHE is the virgin to be sacrificed. When alien conquerors capture her land, she’s immediately bound and delivered to the King of the Vandals. But this notorious alien is in for a rude awakening. He might think he’s getting a simpering princess to claim but Julia’s secret, outlawed magical powers can put an end to the mightiest of rulers.  Does Julia destroy her new husband and save her people from his wrath? Or, has the battle-beast’s passion and love charmed a witch into choosing him above all else?
author: Michele Mills
